channel.title: Need Suggestions
channel.description:
Currently, my stats on my new RuneScape account are:
Combat Lvl - 32 Attack - 40 Strength - 35 Defence - 1 Constitution - 33
I'm debating on getting my defence level up to level 10 so I can wear black armor, mainly because I get hit a lot having 1 defence. I wanted this account to be a pure, but I'm afraid that if I get 10 defence, it may "ruin" it, or I'll end up regretting it in the long run.
Thoughts? Suggestions? Thanks.

item.title: Need Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:419363”]If you’re going for a pure, don’t get defense until you get your other stats up (makes it easier to level later, and you have more time to think about it)

Go for the 40 attack first[/quote]
Yeah, I’m going for 40 attack right now, then probably going to train my strength to 60 or something.

Read full topic
